name: show_loadout_toggle
description: Toggles the option Always Show Inventory (cl_showloadout [bool])

name: +attack2
description: Weapon Scope / Burst mode / Detach Silencer on M4A1-S and USP-S / Adjust grenade trajectory

name: +quickinv
description: Open radial weapon menu, nobody uses this

name: invprev
description: Scrolls to the previous weapon (you shouldn't use this with the mousewheel)

name: invnext
description: Scrolls to the next weapon (you shouldn't use this with the mousewheel)

name: lastinv
description: Switches to the last used weapon

name: switchhands
description: Toggle your viewmodel from left to right

name: rebuy
description: Rebuys the things you bought last round

name: slot4
description: You should not use this, you can cycle through grenades, but direct binds are faster

name: slot5
description: C4 and old Danger Zone stuff

name: slot11
description: Zeus x27, but you can cycle through melee weapons

name: slot13
description: This bind doesn't work, it was used for Danger Zone items

name: +cl_show_team_equipment
description: Show the equipment over the head of your team mates, doesn't work if you already got "Show Team ID Through Walls: Pips, Names, Health, and Equipment"

name: toggleradarscale
description: Toggle the radar zoom level, it's like toggle cl_radar_scale value1 value2

name: callvote
description: Call a vote, not sure if it works right now

name: clutch_mode_toggle
description: It's called Clutch Mode, you can mute any incoming message, works as a toggle

name: +radialradio
description: Chat wheel 1, no one uses this (1)

name: +radialradio2
description: Chat wheel 2, no one uses this (2)

name: +radialradio3
description: Chat wheel 3, no one uses this (3)

name: sellbackall
description: Sells all the bought items that are returnable

name: cs_quit_prompt
description: Quit the game with a confirmation prompt

name: quit
description: Quits the game without any confirmation

name: holdpos
description: It's the classic Z+4 bind (radio + 4), it makes the bots hold their position so they don't rush and die

name: noclip
description: Toggle no clipping mode, you can fly through walls

name: bot_add_t
description: Adds a bot to the Terrorist team

name: bot_add_ct
description: Adds a bot to the Counter-Terrorist team

name: bot_place
description: Places a bot at the crosshair position

name: toggle bot_stop 1 0
description: Stops all bots from doing any action

name: toggle bot_mimic 1 0
description: Makes the bot mimic the player's movements
